Class.Name: KeyStore
Class.Description: Implementation of a key store database.

Function.Name: set
Function.Description: Saves the value with a matching key. Creates a new entry if the key does not exist

Function.Name: get
Function.Description: Gets the value identified with a matching key. Returns 'None' if the key does not exist

Function.Name: remove
Function.Description: Removes value with a matching key

Function.Name: find_key
Function.Description: Returns the record id with a matching key, or 'None' if no match is found

Function.Name: clear
Function.Description: Removes all value from the cache:

Function.Name: for_each
Function.Description: Iterates through each record in the keystore

Function.Name: has_key
Function.Description: Checks if a value with a matching key exists
